name: Untitled Chess Game
description:
Main rules

1. Move the player by clicking on the blue tiles around them.

2. Hover over the chess pieces to see their next move.

3. As you move, keep an eye on your heart count, which will decrease by 1

4. Defeat a chess piece to gain their movement and regain hearts.

5. If your heart count reaches zero or someone steps on you, it's game over.

GLHF - Khoa

More information:

- Color spots on the ground indicate the enemy's next move. Use it to your advantage

- Stepping on a Pawn will not change your move set

- Most chess pieces are blocked by water. Only the Knight can jump over it

Change Logs:

  • v0.07: Bug fixes, QOL, and improvement
    • Added a hide chess piece button on the board to improve visibility
    • Knight will now move according to the real chess rules. As a result, its range was reduced. (Buff is in work to make taking a knight fairer)
    • Fixed a bug that let chess piece teleport to (0,0) coordinate
    • Fixed a bug that let the player heal too much when capturing a chess piece instead of the intended value
    • Various small bug fixes and optimizations 
  • v0.06: Added touchscreen support and slightly adjust the camera view
  • v0.05: Released
